ERROR.AUTH.INVALID_TOKEN_OR_USER_NOT_FOU: Invalid token or user not found.
ERROR.AUTH.PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
ERROR.COLLECTION.PHOTO_ALREADY_EXISTS: Photo already exists in the collection.

ERROR.COLLECTION.UNAUTHORIZED_DELETE: You are not authorized to delete this collection.

ERROR.COLLECTION.UNAUTHORIZED_UPDATE: You are not authorized to update this collection.
ERROR.COMMENT.PARENT_NOT_BELONG_TO_PHOTO: Parent comment does not belong to this photo.
ERROR.COMMENT.PARENT_NOT_BELONG_TO_RESOU: Parent comment does not belong to this resource.
ERROR.COMMENT.TARGET_REQUIRED: Either photoId or seriesId must be provided.
ERROR.COMMENT.UNAUTHORIZED_DELETE: You are not authorized to delete this comment.
ERROR.GLOBAL.FAILED_TO_GET_IMAGE_FROM_S3: Failed to get image from S3.
ERROR.GLOBAL.UNAUTHORIZED: You are not authorized to perform this action.
ERROR.LIKE.TARGET_REQUIRED: Exactly one of photoId, seriesId, or commentId must be provided.
ERROR.NOTIFICATION.IDS_REQUIRED: Notification IDs must be a non-empty array.
ERROR.PHOTO.IS_PUBLIC_REQUIRED: isPublic field is required and must be a boolean.

ERROR.SERIES.UNAUTHORIZED_DELETE: You are not authorized to delete this series.

ERROR.VALIDATION.STRING_MIN: Does not meet minimum length requirement.
ERROR.VALIDATION.EMAIL_INVALID: Please enter a valid email address.
